about_the_game:
The Ariane in Paradise contains the first couple of scenes where you meet Ariane at a pool and go into town together. The demo ends when the game splits into three paths. Then a trailer plays giving you more scenes.

The game is in 1440p, but can be played in smaller resolutions if desired.

Demo contains partial nudity in several places, Full game contains full nudity and sex scenes.

content_descriptors.notes: The demo contains frequent nudity and is not appropriate for players under 18.  There is no sexual content beyond nudity in the demo, but there is in the game it is advertising.

detailed_description:
The Ariane in Paradise contains the first couple of scenes where you meet Ariane at a pool and go into town together. The demo ends when the game splits into three paths. Then a trailer plays giving you more scenes.

The game is in 1440p, but can be played in smaller resolutions if desired.

Demo contains partial nudity in several places, Full game contains full nudity and sex scenes.

name: Ariane in Paradise Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c 1280x720p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Ariane in Paradise contains the first couple of scenes where you meet Ariane at a pool and go into town together. The demo ends when the game splits into three paths. Then a trailer plays giving you more scenes.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
